name: Kings and Pigs Arcade
description:
This is a game I made as part of a challenge - A Game A Day!

In the time of an afternoon, I made this game. The visuals are all part of the Kings and Pigs package here.

All the code was written by myself and the repository is here.

This is a prototype - which means that it works on a fundamental level, but there's much that needs to be fixed. I will continue working on this game until it's more polished. This includes audio, performance fixes, enemy variety, and more gameplay tweaks.
